name: Target from a configuration
description: Create configuration target for the robot's end-effector motion planning.

inputParameters.name: tolerance_above
inputParameters.description: The tolerances above the targeted joint value of each configurable joint, defining the upper bound in radians/meters to be achieved.

inputParameters.name: tolerance_below
inputParameters.description: The tolerances below the targeted joint value of each configurable joint, defining the lower bound in radians/meters to be achieved.
